languages.text: Creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to everyone within and inflicting the burning effect.

traits.locale_text: Creates a burning area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, dealing damage to everyone within and inflicting the burning {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

languages.text: Создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Все, кто находится внутри, получают {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} и эффект горения.
languages.original_text: Creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to everyone within and inflicting the burning effect.

traits.locale_text: Создает область горения на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Все, кто находится внутри, получают урон и {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} горения.
Создает область горения на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Все, кто находится внутри, получают урон и {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} горения.

languages.text: 创造一片{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。区域内所有生物都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并获得燃烧{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。
languages.original_text: Creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to everyone within and inflicting the burning {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 创造一片燃烧区域，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。区域内所有生物都会受到伤害，并获得燃烧{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を全員に与え、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受ける、炎上エリアを作る。
languages.original_text: Creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to everyone within and inflicting the burning {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、炎上エリアを作りその範囲内にいる全員にダメージを与え、炎上{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Crea una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y el efecto de quemadura a todos los que estén dentro.
languages.original_text: Creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to everyone within and inflicting the burning effect.

traits.locale_text: Crea una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de quemadura a todos los que estén dentro.

languages.text: Erzeugt 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang einen brennenden Bereich, der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} verursacht.
languages.original_text: Creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to everyone within and inflicting the burning effect.

traits.locale_text: Erzeugt für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} einen brennenden Bereich, der jedem darin Schaden zufügt und den Verbrennen-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} bewirkt.

languages.text: Crée pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} une zone ardente qui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} à tous ceux qui s'y trouvent.

traits.locale_text: Crée pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} une zone ardente qui inflige des dégâts et l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Combustion à tous ceux qui s'y trouvent.
